title: Can I go back to university if I already have a degree? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you had a degree you would know the answer to that question. If you have a degree and don’t know the answer to that question then you missed MANY classes and squeaked by without really learning much of anything. Sorry, but one of these things is true. Also, possible that Quora is paying someone to invent questions and they reveal their lack of education…what do other think? Any possibilities I missed? Am I being harsh?
Yes of course. Plenty of people get a second degree or take additional classes to enhance their resume and job opportunities as life goes on. I did.
